metadata.title: This Girl Loves Her Great Pyrenees Dog Breed Women's T-Shirt
features: Solid colors: 100% Cotton; Heather Grey: 90% Cotton, 10% Polyester; All Other Heathers: 50% Cotton, 50% Polyester
Love your Great Pyrenees? Let everyone know you love this great and majestic working dog breed with this professionally designed Tee.
Perfect to wear walking the dog, taking to the Groomer, the dog park, or everywhere to let others know you love your Great Pyrenees dog.
Lightweight, Classic fit, Double-needle sleeve and bottom hem
description: Love your Great Pyrenees? Let everyone know you love this great and majestic working dog breed with this professionally designed Tee.
